resource://schemas/sqlite_3451.json.name: Sqlite Database Schema (7 tables)
resource://schemas/sqlite_3451.json.description: Sqlite database schema with 7 tables including: customer_behavior, marketing_campaigns, orders and 4 more

resource://tables/d9d942a5-d358-4643-b7b.name: Monthly Revenue Trends Analysis
resource://tables/d9d942a5-d358-4643-b7b.description: Comprehensive analysis of monthly revenue patterns with sales metrics

metadata.sql_query: SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, SUM(s.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id GROUP BY p.id, p.name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
